data.text:
@Helen_Whately @beisgovuk @KwasiKwarteng @scullyp Ben Elliot, the Tory party chair jointly owns a company that offered ‘luxury lifestyle management services’ to Russian elite.

And Torys wonder why people believe them and their party to be compromised by Russia.
@Stuart_Lannan @Govtandpolitics @Helen_Whately @beisgovuk @KwasiKwarteng Unless I'm really mistaken you're inciting criminal behaviour? Maybe delete this before it's reported?
